mapper.select: select a.id, a.`name`, a.album_id albumId, b.id brandId, b.`name` brandName, c.id categoryId, c.`name` categoryName, a.description, a.delete_status deleteStatus, a.verify_status verifyStatus, a.publish_status publishStatus from pms_product a LEFT JOIN pms_brand b on a.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN pms_category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.delete_status = 0
SELECT t.id, t.category_id categoryId, t.`name` from pms_attribute_key t where t.category_id = #{categoryId}
SELECT t.id, t.attribute_id attributeId, t.attribute_value attributeValue from pms_attribute_value t where t.product_id = #{productId} AND t.attribute_id = #{attributeId}
SELECT t.product_no productNo, t.product_specs productSpecs, t.price, t.stock FROM pms_product_item t WHERE t.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT t.attribute_value from pms_attribute_value t WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_product_item(product_no, product_id, product_specs, pic, price, stock) VALUES (#{productNo}, #{productId}, #{productSpecs}, #{pic}, #{price}, #{stock})
